about_the_game:
About Xontainer Meta Space

Xontainer Meta Space offers a unique simulation experience where players can immerse themselves in a world of logistics, strategy, and innovation. With advanced AI-powered NPCs and a wide array of features, this game brings a new level of realism and interactivity.

Key Features:

  • AI NPCs with Advanced Communication
    Interact with NPCs using either voice (microphone) or text. Each NPC supports two different languages, with a total of 20 languages currently available. English, Turkish, and Spanish are supported at launch.

  • Truck Operations
    Take control of trucks for cargo transportation. Buy, customize, and upgrade your vehicles to improve efficiency and performance.

  • Warehouse Missions
    Engage in tasks like loading and unloading cargo, managing inventory, and completing depot assignments.

  • Forklift and Vehicle Usage
    Operate forklifts for precision tasks or drive vehicles to navigate the expansive in-game world.

  • Energy Production
    Harness power from generators, batteries, and wind turbines to fuel your operations and optimize your logistics network.

  • In-Game Smartphone System
    Use your in-game phone to call other players, transfer money, accept missions, and deliver completed tasks. The smartphone feature brings a dynamic layer of interaction and gameplay management.

Xontainer Meta Space combines realism, strategic gameplay, and player-driven interactions to create a truly immersive simulation experience. Wishlist now and join the next evolution in logistics gaming!
